intro: Ptisana robusta, commonly known as the robusta ptisana, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Rutaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its compound leaves and small, fragrant flowers. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its bark is thick and rough, often containing aromatic compounds. Ptisana robusta is valued in traditional medicine for its purported therapeutic properties.
